desc.text:
This image was created by Gilles Tran with POV-Ray 3.6 using Radiosity. The glasses, ashtray and pitcher were modeled with Rhino and the dice with Cinema 4D.
The POV-Ray code for this image is available here (zip file, 6 Mb). The code is also released into the Public Domain. New, larger rendering by Deadcode.
Français : Image d'objets transparents montrant les capacités du logiciel POV-Ray.
日本語: オープンソースのレイトレーシング・ソフトウェアのPOV-Rayで3Dレンダリングされた画像
Date	19 April 2006
Source	http://www.oyonale.com/modeles.php?lang=en&page=40
Author	Gilles Tran
